name: Joyce X
description: I am patient, calm and understanding. But everyone has our melting point, everything has limitations. I am pretty kind, genuine, honest, loving and caring. Family is pretty important to me and my smile is contagious. I do modelling to support my studies and my family. I love to love and share the great things in life to someone else. Pretty mature when it comes to relationship and super serious about looking for my missing piece.
